document_data.name: ''Khuur''
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the instrument|the [[Merrow (ogre)|merrow]] kingdom|Khuur}}
The '''khuur''' was a stringed musical instrument used by the nomads of the vast steppes of the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description: A typical khuur was made from wood with horsehide stretched tightly over the front. Two strings were fitted from the long neck to the base of the instrument and played with a bow. The khuur was usually played while sitting cross-legged.
document_data.History: The musicians of the steppes, called [[Tuigan dictionary|kaychi]], believed each instrument carried its own spirit, prompting them to make offerings in their honor. Because of this all khuur were handled with care and treated with honor.
